summary: On New Year's Eve in 1955, Richard Howell, a patient at the Hillcrest Sanatorium, went on a bloody rampage, killing three children before he hanged himself.
cast: Don Fanelli|Charlie Fersko|DJ Hazard|Lauren Hunter|Tim Martin|Megan Neuringer|Katherine Puma|Justin Purnell|Kate Riley|Ben Rodgers
title: Sanatorium
